div.h4: School Closure Through Remainder of 19-20 School Year.
div.p: Governor Abbott issued an executive order requiring all Texas schools to remain closed and continue distance learning for the remainder of the school year. This is a difficult time for everyone and we would like to thank you for your continued flexibility. NOTICE: Drive-through packet pickup scheduled for April 30th from 12:00-2:00.
